name: Drift or Die!
description:
(This game was made for the 2023 7DRL Game Jam, the web version might contain performance issues)

Drift or Die!

Find water in each stage before running of fuel. Zombies cannot damage you but will slow you down.

Controls
  • WASD or the arrow keys to move
  • 1/2 or 9/0 to use items
  • M to mute all game sounds
Credits:
  • Godot Sound Manager
  • E1234 font
  • Hit sound effects
  • Bell sound effect
  • Hyper Ultra-Racing (song) by Alex Smith
  • The Wreck (song) by Zander Noriega
  • Everything else by me
